title: 求教设置矿物生成
author: uufengfeng
txt_content:
我想把林业和热力膨胀mod的铜，锡矿限制掉
百度搜，看了视频有林业和红石的，按着步骤来虽然找到了林业的配置文件，但里面完全没有视频里面演示的字段
怎么关掉这俩mod的铜和锡？

replies.author: ·P9·
replies.txt_content:
# set to false to force forestry to skip generating own copper ore blocks in the world
world.generate.copper=true
# set to false to force forestry to skip generating own tin ore blocks in the world
world.generate.tin=true

林业的common.conf，最下面这两个
ture改为false
